CustomField.description: Link to Google Search within LinkedIn
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( 'https://www.google.com/search?q=site%3Alinkedin.com%2Fin%2F+AND+"' & FirstName & '+' & MiddleName & '+' & LastName & '"+AND+"' & Account.Name & '"', 'Probable Results Link',"_blank")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Link to Google Search within LinkedIn
CustomField.label: LinkedIn Search
